name: Quick Start Guide to Figma's UI
description:
A short presentation to help someone quickly get started, becoming familiar with Figma's UI. Especially useful for non-designers, those who might not be familiar with design tools, or even just a beginner with using Figma.


Filled with lots of screenshots, hotkeys, and even GIFs!


Update 07/2021

  • Updated screenshots for Project/File browser
  • Updated screenshot for New File menu
  • Fixed shortcut for Zoom to 100% (Windows)
